title: Bug 14525Visual confirmation should be given when adding interfaces
EB: Bug 14525Visual confirmation should be given when adding interfaces BUILD: 20020412When using the Interface Selection dialog, the user should be given some sort ofvisual confirmation that the interfaces they select have actually been addedafter hitting the Add button.Perhaps placing a check mark next to interfacesthat have already been added, or keeping a separate list inside the dialog ofpreviously added interfaces.The latter sugegstion opens up the possibility ofremoving interfaces from the list of currently selected ones.
